name: Orange Grenadine With Granola
keywords: dessert, granola, grenadine syrup, seedless orange, raw, winter
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons Cointreau or other orange-flavored liqueur (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: With a sharp paring knife, cut off both the orange outer skin of the oranges and the cottony white skin surrounding the flesh of the fruit. Cut each orange crosswise into 5 slices, each about 3/8-inch thick. Place the orange slices in a bowl, and refrigerate until serving time.

When ready to serve, spoon about 1/4 cup of the yogurt onto each of six dessert plates, and sprinkle with grenadine and granola. Arrange about 3 slices of orange on top of the mixture on each plate and, if desired, sprinkle the orange slices with a little Cointreau. Serve immediately.
